cells.data:
# SWIG node properties

The `%rename` directive changes the `sym:name` property

# Running unit tests

To run fortran and build a list of failing tests:

    cd Examples/test-suite/fortran
    rm summary.txt
    make -k check-cpp
 
The dumping of pass/failing tests into summary.txt was added in `2520171dc2ee16c0e099f577f0d3ec2a78376c05` . The failure list can be processed using `swig-failures/process-failures.ipynb` in this repo, then used to update `Examples/test-suite/fortran/Makefile.in`.

To run a single check:

    make director_smartptr.cpptest
